pullRequest.title: Fix allow using aggregations in format()
pullRequest.bodyText: fix #3829 - allow using aggregations in format() function

nodes.bodyText: Rename to testAggregationInFormat to clarify this is not a generic test, but we're exercising a specific behavior.

This needs to process all arguments to Format. Otherwise, the analyzer won't realize this is an invalid query:
SELECT format(s, sum(v)) FROM (VALUES ('%s', 1)) t(s, v)

(s must be in the group by clause)

afterCommit.message: Fix allow using aggregations in format()

commit.message: Fix failure for aggregation as argument to format function

beforeCommit.message: Fix allow using aggregations in format()

afterCommit.message: Fix failure for aggregation as argument to format function
